about.title: Hello, I'm Ferhat
about.description: Mechatronics Engineer specializing in Control Systems, AI, and Advanced Technology.An experienced professional focused on shaping the future with innovative technologies and developing AI-powered solutions for complex engineering problems. I aim to deliver measurable results through my expertise in Hyperloop, control systems, and R&D.

jobs.title: Mechatronics Engineering Intern
description: Designed controllers and performed stability analysis using DC motor models.
Conducted performance evaluations and technical reporting by simulating motor behavior.
Developed practical and effective engineering solutions, deepening my knowledge of control systems.

jobs.title: R&D Engineer & Mechanical Team Leader
description: Led the team that achieved Turkey's first Hyperloop levitation success.
Won second place and the 'Propulsion System Development Award' at TEKNOFEST 2024.
Managed mechanical system design and analysis processes using SOLIDWORKS and Ansys.
Undertook technical presentation and representation duties in international competitions (Scotland, Switzerland).

jobs.title: Project Coordinator (Graduation Project)
description: Developed an AI-Based Electrodynamic Levitation System.
Designed AI-based modeling and control algorithms for non-linear system dynamics.
Conducted simulations and physical prototype tests using C++ and Python.
Gained in-depth expertise in modern control and data-driven solutions.
